author: gertjan68
title: sleek fighter
review:
Box/Instructions

Box is pretty straightforward for all Creator sets, showing the three possible builds on the package

Parts

Nothing shocking, the combination of white, yellow and blue makes a lovely plane, also they main plane has movable wings!

Minifigures

none

The build

My 5yo son managed to build the sleek fighter by himself, so building is pretty straightforward

The completed model

Gives ample playability, as with most Creator sets.

Overall opinion

A nice set, no new bricks, but efficient and interesting use of them to enable the use of moveable wings !

author: strategus
title: Excellent color schema, playability and bang for the buck !
review:
This plane with two engines and variable-sweep wings remember me my childhood where the F-14 Tomcat dominated the skies over the seas.

 

Building

The design used to move the wings is simple, reliable and well thinked for the scale.

My 5 years old son didn't have any issue with the building steps.

 

Parts

Good diversity of parts, the choice of the color scheme is very appealing.

 

Playability

The playability is good. The plane is pretty sturdy for a 5 years boy.

When I borrow the plane I can't stop using the sweep mechanism.

 

Value for the money

3 models for the price of one. It is a Creator box of course! The second model (futuristic plane) is cool.

High five to the designer !
